scenarioStatement.content: GRANT CREATE,SELECT,INSERT,DELETE,UPDATE,ALTER,DROP ON testdb.* TO 'testdb'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'testdb';
FLUSH PRIVILEGES;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `gm_std_measurements_myisam`;

CREATE TABLE `gm_std_measurements_myisam` (`id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `project_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `fkDataSeriesId` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `measDateUtc` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `measDateSite` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `measvalue` double DEFAULT NULL, `refMeas` bit(1) DEFAULT NULL, `reliability` double DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `default_gm_index` (`fkDataSeriesId`, `measDateUtc`, `measDateSite`, `project_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
INSERT INTO `gm_std_measurements_myisam` (`fkDataSeriesId`, `measDateUtc`, `measDateSite`, `project_id`, `measvalue`, `refMeas`, `reliability`) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 0, 1.0);
SELECT fkDataSeriesId, measDateUtc, measDateSite, project_id, measvalue FROM gm_std_measurements_myisam WHERE fkDataSeriesId=?;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `gm_std_measurements_innodb`;

CREATE TABLE `gm_std_measurements_innodb` (`id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `project_id` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `fkDataSeriesId` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL, `measDateUtc` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `measDateSite` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `measvalue` double DEFAULT NULL, `refMeas` bit(1) DEFAULT NULL, `reliability` double DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `default_gm_index` (`fkDataSeriesId`, `measDateUtc`, `measDateSite`, `project_id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

SELECT fkDataSeriesId, measDateUtc, measDateSite, project_id, measvalue FROM gm_std_measurements_innodb WHERE fkDataSeriesId=?;
